arts.ttl: Europa League: Aston Villa v Maccabi Tel Aviv, Rangers v Roma, and more – live
arts.sum: ⚽ Europa League updates from the 8pm GMT kick-offs ⚽ Live scores | Read today’s Football Daily | Mail Michael We are here because we love association football, but sport does not exist in a vacuum. Sometimes it can be caught in the crosshairs of something larger and that is certainly the case tonight. This is a football liveblog, and we have nine Europa League 8pm GMT kick-offs to follow, of which Aston Villa v Maccabi Tel Aviv is one. My focus is on the football but I will also bring you any notable developments around the fringes of Villa Park, should there be any. Continue reading...
